Debate Issue: With Books Or With Facebook | Debate.org
Number of arguments: 4


Evidence Pro: Are You with Books? Or Facebook?

Evidence Pro: Mandar forfeited this round. Con Facebook has superiority over books when it comes to: -communication -social -miscellaneous It has games that you can play, and books kill trees. You can talk to friends, family, and anyone else in the world. It has groups, pages, and much more content than books. You can read the contents of books on Facebook if you have a friend who posts it up over the Internet.

Evidence Pro: Mandar forfeited this round. Con It was (not) going so well...

Evidence Con: I accept this debate and will begin my argument in round 2 when Pro has chosen a side for books or for Facebook.

Evidence Con: Facebook has superiority over books when it comes to: -communication -social -miscellaneous It has games that you can play, and books kill trees. You can talk to friends, family, and anyone else in the world. It has groups, pages, and much more content than books. You can read the contents of books on Facebook if you have a friend who posts it up over the Internet.

Evidence Con: It was (not) going so well...
